reviews.review_msg: This class was horrible. I would NEVER recommend it to anyone. She expects you to do an online midterm which is 25% of your grade 80 questions in 40 MINUTES. She is not fair the questions are long she picks the randomest things and tests you on it. She did not even give us any information for what to focus on. HORRIBLE I HATE THIS CLASS.

She gave an online exam, WHICH CONSISTED OF 80 QUESTIONS to be done in 40 MINUTES!! It was so unrealistic... 30 seconds per question. Come on now, no one can go through a question that quick. DO NOT take a class with her!! I DISREGARDED what ppl said on this site when i really wish i listened and never took her class.
